comment.author: 66151649@N02
comment._content: The Wacky 60's! (Can't really come up with anything else...)

comment.author: 47290943@N03
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/66151649@N02] Well, the city wasn't wholly urban back then! There was a Riding Stables just across the road from where this photo was taken...
comment.authorname: National Library of Ireland on The Commons

comment.author: 27288826@N00
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/nlireland] Yes - Kellet's, IIRC - my older brother went there a few times in the 70's, but stopped when they moved 'out to the country'.

comment.author: 47290943@N03
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/type17] As did my older sister! Iris Kellett died in 2011. This obituary says her stables were originally the British Army Cavalry Stables.
comment.authorname: National Library of Ireland on The Commons
